short: Heavy. Does what it says. Don't expect to sprint.
Blaster bolts hurt less. Knees still hurt.
Looks intimidating. That alone scared off two idiots.
Saved my life once. Still dents easily.
Maintenance is a pain but so is dying.
Not subtle. Not quiet. Very sturdy.
Not worth it unless you're expecting real danger.
longStories: I ordered this armor because Rendarr said it was 'battle proven.' What he did NOT say was that the battle was apparently against gravity. The crate arrived three days late, upside down, and the delivery droid wouldn't explain why it was smoking. Wore the armor anyway. Got shot once. Did not die. Fell down twice. Died a little inside.

Delivery took so long I forgot I ordered this. I thought someone sent me a prank crate. Opened it, boom, armor. Tried it on. Armor good. Helmet smells like someone else's head. Rendarr says 'previous owner was careful.' I do not believe him.
I wore this armor on a job where the plan was 'walk in confidently and hope no one shoots us.' They shot us. A lot. Armor held. Confidence held. My legs did not.
